ptdb.common.dto

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptdb.common.dto.Task
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeSearchTask, CreateModelTask, FetchHierarchyTask, GetAttributesTask, GetFirstLevelParentsTask, GetModelsTask, GetModelTask, GraphSearchTask, ModelNameSearchTask, RemoveModelsTask, SaveModelTask, UpdateParentsToNewVersionTask

    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that defines a task that can be executed over the database.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Ashwini Bijwe
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (abijwe)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (abijwe)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean _isUpdateTask
      There are two types of tasks - Update/Write tasks that change the data in the database and Select/Read that read the data from the database.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Task() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isUpdateTask()
      Return true if the given task is an update task or false if it is a select task.
      void setIsUpdateTask(boolean isUpdateTask)
      Set the given task as an update task or select task depending on the value of isUpdateTask.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • _isUpdateTask

        protected boolean _isUpdateTask
        There are two types of tasks - Update/Write tasks that change the data in the database and Select/Read that read the data from the database. If this is true, then the task is an Update/Write task. If this is false, then the task is a Read/Select task.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task()

    • Method Detail

      • isUpdateTask

        public boolean isUpdateTask()
        Return true if the given task is an update task or false if it is a select task.
        Returns:
        True if task is an update task, false otherwise.

      • setIsUpdateTask

        public void setIsUpdateTask(boolean isUpdateTask)
        Set the given task as an update task or select task depending on the value of isUpdateTask.
        Parameters:
        isUpdateTask - Boolean that specifies if the given task is an update task.
